column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Once they reheated our The Malnati Chicago Classic pizza
column2: the waitress cut into the pizza and scooped it out for us to munch down on. Let me tell you
column3: it's cheesy. And you have the option to add parmesan cheese to it
column4: if a lot of cheese still isn't enough. I thought the cheese got to be overwhelming at some spots that I had to scoop the cheese out. We got the small and because of how thick it was
column5: I wasn't able to finish the two slices designated for me so we ended up taking one home. Don't get me wrong
column6: I thought it was still good
column7: very well seasoned but the cheese kind of put me over the edge.
